Trails.Name: Lost in the Woods (Lower) Uphill Route
Lost in the Woods (Upper) Uphill Route

_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
Thursday, January 1, 2026 5:30 PM With snow falling all throughout the day, the mountain received a welcome refresh just in time for the weekend.

15 lifts are expected to spin on Friday, January 2, beginning at 9:00 AM. With fresh snow on the mountain and more in forecast, it is important to remember to ride with a buddy and keep them in sight at all times. Check out this page for more safety tips.
_inspectorSnowReport.SafetyReport: Give others space on the slopes and avoid tree wells.
